isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CUMMINS PACE - 1992 - 1993 - SERVICE TOOLS

svcproc.title: Service Procedure
svcproc.para: PT Pacer vehicles have a male data link connector for the Compulink and a female diagnostic connector for use with a PT Pacer Fault Code Monitor.

The Compulink is used to program owner specified information into the PCU, monitor the system, and assist in troubleshooting the system in the event of a malfunction. The Compulink may be available at the nearest Cummins Authorized Service Center. Replacement 8-way data link connector cables (part number 3615693) for the Compulink can be ordered from Cummins dealer.

The hand-held, PT Pacer Fault Code Monitor has a light and will flash out the active electronic fault codes. The PT Pacer Fault Code Monitor is Cummins part number 3823613, and can be purchased from authorized Cummins Dealers.

note.para: On the Cummins Compulink, since no alpha characters are available, use the up arrow and down arrow to move through the alphabet.
